hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e18791084b821319c738aab701b17fce.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{?} \text{ squirrels}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{6} \text{ squirrels joined them}}\\
=&\pink{11} \text{ squirrels on the branch}\end{align}$

question.content:
Some squirrels were sitting on a branch. $6$ more squirrels joined them. Now, there are $11$ squirrels on the branch.

 **How many squirrels were on the branch at first? **

[[☃ input-number 1]] squirrels
